verbs.description: Ahead of tea in the Red Room with Spain 's Queen Letizia , Melania Trump [V: was] photographed in the Oval Office sitting on a couch , surrounded by photographers and reporters .

[ARGM-TMP: Ahead of tea in the Red Room with Spain 's Queen Letizia] , [ARG1: Melania Trump] was [V: photographed] [ARGM-LOC: in the Oval Office] [ARGM-ADV: sitting on a couch , surrounded by photographers and reporters] .
